body_html:
@pwuertz I'd also be interested in the fixes you had to do, I'm also having problems building TF on ubuntu 18.04...

@jlebar I tried the clang option, but when I start the build I get:

Illegal ambiguous match on configurable attribute "deps" in //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:included_headers_gather:
@local_config_cuda//cuda:using_nvcc
@local_config_cuda//cuda:using_clang
Multiple matches are not allowed unless one is unambiguously more specialized.

Seems like there's a bug in the configure script... (I'm using the latest master code version)
